entry.title: $2700 // NEW_2BR-WASHER_DRYER_DISHWASHER_BROADWAY-36 ST
entry.content:
**LOTS OF SUNLIGHT
****ALL NEW AND MODERN APARTMENT

WASHER AND DRYER INSIDE THE APARTMENT

Great 2- LARGE - SIZE separates Bedrooms
BIG WALL TO WALL CLOSETS IN EACH BEDROOM

MODERN LARGE OPEN -DESIGN LIVING ROOM THAT FITS A LARGE SECTIONAL COUCH.
OPEN INTO THE KITCHEN AREA
LARGE ISLAND GRANITE COUNTER TOP THAT SERVES AS A TABLE FOR 4 PEOPLE
STAINLESS STEEL APPLIACES
STAINLESS STEEL DISHWASHER
STAINLESS STEEL MICROWAVE
STAINLESS STEEL STOVE

WOOD FLOORS

NO PETS PLEASE

THE RENT INCLUDES HEAT AND HOT WATER


VERY close N \ W Train Broadway
VERY close to R - M Train at Steinway Street
IN THE MIDDLE OF MANY STORES , CAFES, RESTAURANTS, GYMS , BARS , BANKS

**INCLUDE YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER IF YOU REPLY VIA EMAIL*
